conclusion: Block A freely falls onto the table where the block group is placed.
The image shows a green stack, an orange stack, a blue stack, and a yellow stack of blocks placed on a green tabletop. Block A is depicted falling toward the yellow stack.
Block A will collide with the right-hand yellow stack first based on its trajectory.
After the collision, Block A will be deflected slightly forward (toward the camera).
Block A will come to rest on the tabletop directly in front of the yellow stack.
